Workshop Description {.unnumbered}
Graphical one-pagers are powerful ways to convey complex scientific information to a general audience and summarize working group outputs. Learn how to create compelling materials, including choices around fonts, layouts, content, and color schemes.


Learning Objectives{.unnumbered}
-   Learn about free graphic resources like Coolers, Font Awesome, and the Noun Project 

-   Reflect on your desired audience and goals for this science communication project

-   Recognize compelling components of infographic content and layout

-   Determine suitable color schemes for infographics and practice implementing them

-   Customize infographics with text, fonts, photos, colors, and layouts in Google Docs
